settings.text: YOUR TICKET TO A HIGHER SELF

settings.detail: Explore Canada's most exclusive 360 wellness membership

settings.text1: YOUR TICKET TO A HIGHER SELF

settings.text: verb  /trænˈsend/ to move beyond ordinary limitations; a state of existence above and beyond material experience

settings.title: BE BOUNDLESS
settings.desc:
Get all-location access, including S&T at Yonge/Shuter and Front/Spadina in Toronto + Silver Springs in Los Angeles.

Includes 72-hour advanced priority booking and waived class cancellation fees.

settings.title: SWEAT
settings.desc: Access unlimited classes + enjoy your choice of 4 Personal Training or 8 Small Group Training sessions monthly.

settings.title: RECOVER
settings.desc: Recover and rejuvenate with unlimited access to the pool deck at Tonic Spa and essential biohacking treatments.

settings.title: TRANSFORM
settings.desc: Achieve longevity - our wellness concierge team and dietician will work with you to develop a personalized protocol that integrates 360 wellness and recovery at Tonic Spa, designed and optimized for your unique needs and goals.

settings.title:
TRANSCEND
verb /trænˈsend/
to move beyond ordinary limitations; a state of existence above and beyond material experience.

settings.heading: GROUP FITNESS CLASSES
settings.detail: Access unlimited yoga, Pilates, HIIT, and Ride group fitness classes at all locations.

settings.heading: PERSONAL & SMALL GROUP TRAINING
settings.detail: Choice of 4 Personal Training sessions with our principal trainers or 8 Small Group Training sessions per month.

settings.heading: RED LIGHT THERAPY
settings.detail:
Unlimited sessions per month

Recover & rejuvenate in the TheraLight 360+ and experience the most advanced full-body photobiomodulation system.

settings.heading: COMPRESSION THERAPY
settings.detail:
Unlimited sessions per month

Recover & reshape with state-of-the-art lymphatic drainage technology to countour your body, accelerate recovery, detox, and improve circulation.

settings.heading: HOT & COLD THERAPY
settings.detail:
8 sessions per month + 8 guest allowances

Toronto's first and only private, four-person dual infrared and traditional high-heat sauna and cold plunge suite.

settings.heading: DEXA SCAN
settings.detail:
4 scans per year (one every 3 months based on 12-month membership)

Gain accurate and detailed insights into your body composition with full-body imaging to help you improve your health, fitness goals, and physical well-being.

settings.heading: DIETETICS
settings.detail:
1 consultation per year

Find food freedom and develop an abundant relationship with food that supports your physical, mental, and emotional wellbeing.

settings.heading: IV VITAMIN THERAPY
settings.detail:
1 session per month

Supercharge your body with personalized intravenous tonics carefully formulated to optimize your health.

settings.heading: POOL DECK AT TONIC SPA
settings.detail:
Unlimited sessions per month

50 ft. saltwater lap pool, saltwater jetted hot tub, combined infrared & traditional electric sauna, rain & cold plunge showers, and all-season patio.

settings.heading: PRIVATE MEETING ROOMS
settings.detail: 4 private one-hour meeting room bookings at Tonic House (Front/Spadina) per month

settings.heading: GUEST CREDITS
settings.detail:
5 guest class credits per month

Share the love and get your sweat on with family and friends in our yoga, Pilates, HIIT and ride classes.

settings.heading: ADDITIONAL BENEFITS
settings.detail:
• Unlimited Tonic House access
  • 15% off massage, Ayurveda, and skin care treatments at Tonic Spa
  • 10% off S&T shop
  • 72-hour priority booking for classes, Small Group Training, pool deck, and biohacking at Tonic Spa

settings.heading: MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS
settings.text:
$1,000 / MONTH INCLUDES:

  • Unlimited classes at The Well, Yonge/Shuter & Silver Springs Los Angeles
  • 72-hr advanced priority class booking
  • Waived late/cancellation fees for classes
  • Unlimited access to Tonic House
  • 4 x Personal Training with our principal trainers or 8 x Small Group Training sessions per month
  • Unlimited pool deck access
  • Unlimited red light therapy and lymphatic compression therapy
  • 8 x hot & cold therapy sessions per month + 8 guest credits
  • 1 x dietetics consultation / year
  • 1 x IV vitamin therapy / month
  • 4 x DEXA scan / year (every 3 months, based on 12-month membership)
  • Private meeting room bookings (4 hrs / month)
  • 5 guest class credits / month (valid at all locations)
  • 15% off Tonic Spa treatments (massage & skin care)
  • 10% off S&T Shop

($3,000+ total value)

Only 50 memberships available

settings.description: Woman using luxurious facilities at Tonic Spa at Sweat and Tonic, in a dimly lit, vibey setting, including the pool, sauna, hot and cold therapy, red light therapy, and personal training studio.

settings.heading: CLUB TRANSCEND+
settings.text:
Transcend with a loved one: Add a family member or loved one to your membership and double up on Club Transcend benefits for only an additional $750.

Valid for one guest per year. Add-on guest cannot be pre-existing Club Transcend member.

settings.button_label_1: LOOKING TO GET STARTED? GET IN TOUCH

settings.heading: HOW MANY MEMBERSHIPS ARE AVAILABLE?
settings.row_content: There are only 50 exclusive Club Transcend memberships available.

settings.heading: HOW DO I SIGN UP?
settings.row_content: You can purchase a membership in the S&T app or online, or get in touch with a wellness concierge at Tonic Spa to book a personalized tour and start your journey.

settings.heading: CAN I BRING A GUEST?
settings.row_content:
Your Club Transcend membership includes:

  • 5 guest credits per month for yoga, Pilates, HIIT and ride classes. Your guest may attend classes on their own.
  • 8 guest allowances per month for Hot & Cold therapy. You must accompany your guest for Hot & Cold Therapy sessions.

As an exclusive Club Transcend member benefit, you can also add a loved one to your membership for only $750, and your loved one will get to enjoy all the same benefits!

settings.heading: HOW DO I ADD A LOVED ONE TO MY MEMBERSHIP?
settings.row_content:
Add-ons can be purchased in the S&T app or online, or by contacting our concierge team.

The membership add-on should be purchased by the primary Club Transcend member. You can extend the add-on to one guest per year. The add-on guest cannot be a pre-existing Club Transcend member.

settings.heading: ARE THERE ANY CONTRACTS OR ANNUAL COMMITMENT?
settings.row_content:
As always at S&T, there is no annual commitment, no initiation fees, and you can cancel your membership at anytime.

And as long as your membership is active, your monthly rate is price-protected, always and forever.

settings.heading: WAIVED CLASS CANCELLATION FEES
settings.row_content: Sweat easy - all late cancellation / no show fees for classes are waived with a Club Transcend membership.

settings.heading: PERSONAL & SMALL GROUP TRAINING
settings.row_content:
Your membership includes a choice of 4 Personal Training sessions with our principal trainers or 8 Small Group Training sessions per month. If you'd like to mix and match - feel free to get in touch with our team for assistance.

If you are unable to attend your booked session, you must cancel your booking at least 12 hours in advance or you will lose the value of the session / credit.

settings.heading: BIOHACKING AT TONIC SPA
settings.row_content:
Your membership includes

  • 8 x hot & cold therapy sessions per month + 8 guest allowances
  • Unlimited red light therapy and compression therapy per month

If you are unable to attend your booked session, you must cancel your booking at least 12 hours in advance or you will lose the value of the session / credit.

settings.heading: TONIC SPA TREATMENTS
settings.row_content:
Your membership includes:

  • 1 x dietetics consultation / year
  • 1 x IV vitamin therapy / month
  • 4 x DEXA scan / year (every 3 months, based on 12-month membership)

If you are unable to attend your booked session, you must cancel your booking at least 24 hours in advance or you will be charged the full value of the session.

settings.heading: DO SERVICES CARRY OVER?
settings.row_content: Services and allowances expire within the billing month and do not carry over.

settings.heading: CAN I FREEZE MY MEMBERSHIP?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can request one (1) membership freeze up to 14 days for every 6 months of membership, up to a maximum of two (2) membership freezes in a 12-month period, beginning the first date of your membership. Your membership start date is the date you signed up for a membership. This does not include involuntary freezes, such as studio closures. In the case of an injury, you can request to freeze your membership for the duration of the injury with a doctor’s note. In the case of pregnancy, you can request to freeze your membership for the duration of your pregnancy with a doctor’s note up to 12 months. You must provide a minimum of three (3) days’ notice to ensure your account is not automatically charged. Please contact us at clubtranscend@sweatandtonic.com to put your account on hold.
